author: chabotc
msg: Initial version of REST API support for PHP Shindig.
This isn't complete yet, so don't try to put this into production just yet ok :)
To try this out, edit your container.js set useRestful : true and set the social data
To make sure we don't break anyone's live code during the development of the REST interface
i've seperated out the old wireformat and rest format into 2 different directories:
src/socialdata = the un-touched original wireformat code
Unfortunately the internal API's had to be changed to make everything fit with the REST API,
the bigest change is that i moved away from the single handler class and went (back) to the
3 Data Service classes (People, AppData and Activities).
The format is close enough to the old one though that it shouldn't take a lot of effort to
port your code to the new interface once your ready to switch over.
